Module com.example.project4ruburger

Package com.example.project4ruburger.controller

package com.example.project4ruburger.controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BeverageController
    The beverage controller handles all the actions of the beverage page, which creates the beverage based off the user customization
    BurgerController
    The burger controller handles all the actions of the burger page, which creates the burger based off the user customization, users additionally have the option to change it to a combo
    ComboController
    The combo controller handles all the actions of the combo page, which creates the combo * based off the user customization
    CurrentOrderController
    This controller class manages the Current Order view in the application.
    MainController
    This is the main controller which sets up the main menu view
    PlacedOrderController
    This controller class manages the viewing, cancelling and exporting placed orders.
    SandwichController
    The sandwich controller handles all the actions of the sandwich page, which creates the sandwich based off the user customization, users additionally have the option to change it to a combo
    SideController
    The side controller handles all the actions of the side page, which creates the side based off the user customization
